data.enText: to make yourself responsible for sth and start doing it

data.chText: 承担一个任务 / 项目
大学教授既要教学又要从事研究工作。
data.enText: University professors both teach and undertake research .

data.chText: 公司已经宣布将对这次事故进行全面调查。
data.enText: The company has announced that it will undertake a full investigation into the accident.
to agree or promise that you will do sth

data.chText: 他答应星期五或之前完成这一工作。
data.enText: He undertook to finish the job by Friday.

tr: enter upon an activity or enterprise

value.def: When you undertake a task or job, you start doing it and accept responsibility for it.

example.ex: She undertook the arduous task of monitoring the elections.
example.tran: 她承担了监督选举的艰巨任务。

value.def: If you undertake to do something, you promise that you will do it.

example.ex: He undertook to edit the text himself.
example.tran: 他答应亲自编辑正文的内容。
